text: Niklas Bernd Dorsch (born 15 January 1998) is a German professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Bundesliga club FC Augsburg. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2015–16 Regionalliga Bayern 6 0 — — — 6 0 2016–17 24 3 — — — 24 3 2017–18 31 4 — — — 31 4 Total 61 7 — — — 61 7 Bayern Munich 2017–18 Bundesliga 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 1 1\.
